Audio.Author: Bruno Arantes de Andrade Bueno
Audio.Comments: **Description:** Male and female duet. Pair was forraging at roughly 3m above ground amidst the leaves of a small tree, halfway to the canopy. Very short recording, only one vocalization.**Habitat:** Urban backyard.**Equipment:** Sony ICD-PX312 personal recorder.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
